accreditation: NAAC B++ Grade (CGPA 2.89) valid till Feb 2028. Hemchand Yadav University se affiliated. UGC 2(f) recognized.

DCA.desc: Diploma in Computer Applications - Office Automation, C/Python Programming, HTML aur E-Commerce. Practical-oriented quick course jo IT field me entry ke liye best hai.

PGDCA.desc: PG Diploma in Computer Applications - Software Organization, Python, DBMS, Tally aur Project Work. Graduates ke liye IT skills enhance karne ka best option.

director.message: Knowledge creation and dissemination is the prime motive.
director.name: Harmeet Singh Sachdev

facilities.hostel: 🏠 Separate boys 👨 aur girls 👩 hostels with security 🧑‍💼, mess facility 🍽️, study rooms 📚 aur comfortable stay. Outstation students ke liye homely environment provide karta hai college.
facilities.incubation: 🏭 Sai Kalakriti & Incubation Centre (Dec 2021) 🎯 - Soap making 🧼, Jewellery designing 💍, Jute bags 👜 aur skill development workshops 🛠️. Students ko entrepreneur 💼 banane ka unique platform.
facilities.labs: 🔬 State-of-the-art labs: Physics ⚡, Chemistry 🧪, Botany 🌱, Zoology 🐾, Microbiology 🦠, Biotechnology 🧬 aur 400+ Core i3 computers 💻 with high-speed internet. Government aur private exams bhi yahan conduct hote hain.
facilities.library: 📚 50,000+ books 📖, E-library facility 💻, Digital journals 📰, Wi-Fi reading rooms 📡 aur N-LIST resources available. Best N-LIST User Award bhi mila hai. Students semester bhar books rakh sakte hain.
facilities.sports: 🏃♂️ Outdoor: Cricket 🏏, Volleyball 🏐, Football ⚽, Handball 🤾. Indoor: Table Tennis 🏓, Badminton 🏸, Carrom ♟️, Chess ♟️. State/National level players ko fee concession milta hai. Regular tournaments organize hote hain.
facilities.transport: 🚌 College ki apni buses available 🚍. Bhilai, Durg aur nearby areas me routes cover hoti hain. Bhilai Nagar Railway Station se 200m 🚉 aur Six Tree Avenue se 100m dur hai college.

name: Sai College (Sai Mahavidyalaya), Sector-06, Bhilai, Chhattisgarh

M.A. (English).desc: M.A. English - Critical Theory, Indian Writing, American Literature aur Linguistics. Advanced language skills develop hoti hai. Teaching, research, content writing aur editorial careers ke liye perfect.

M.Com.desc: Master of Commerce - Advanced Accounting, Taxation, Financial Management aur Marketing. Specializations: Finance, Marketing, Banking & Insurance. Corporate jobs aur PhD research ke liye excellent platform.

M.Lib. (ISc).desc: Master of Library & Information Science - Library Organization, Cataloguing, Digital Libraries aur Computer Applications. Educational institutions aur corporate libraries me librarian positions ke liye professional degree.

MSc Biotech.desc: M.Sc. Biotechnology - Advanced Genetic Engineering, Bioinformatics, Nano Biotechnology aur Research Methodology. Modern lab facilities me project work aur paper publication mandatory hai. Research aur pharma industries ke liye best course.

MSc CS.desc: M.Sc. Computer Science - Operating Systems, RDBMS, AI, Data Mining, Python, Java programming. Advanced topics: Computer Graphics, Image Processing, Software Engineering. Practical implementation pe strong focus hai.

MSc Chemistry.desc: M.Sc. Chemistry - Organic, Inorganic, Physical Chemistry aur Spectroscopy ka deep knowledge. Modern analytical instruments wale labs me research work. NET/GATE qualification ke liye best preparation.

B.Com.desc: Bachelor of Commerce - Accounting, Economics, GST, Taxation aur Finance me expertise develop hoti hai. NEP 2020 pattern follow karta hai. CA, CS, CMA jaise professional exams ke liye best preparation. Specializations: Finance, Marketing, Computer Applications.

BA.desc: Bachelor of Arts - Sociology, Economics, Hindi Literature aur Political Science subjects available. Analytical thinking aur communication skills develop hoti hai. Civil services, teaching, journalism aur social work careers ke liye ideal.

BBA.desc: Bachelor of Business Administration - Management, Marketing, Finance, HR aur Operations ka complete knowledge. Business communication, leadership skills aur entrepreneurship ke through industrial exposure milta hai. Corporate career ke liye perfect course.

BCA.desc: Bachelor of Computer Applications - Programming (C, Python, Java), Database Management, Web Development aur Software Engineering sikhate hain. NEP 2020 pattern ke saath 400+ computers wale labs me practical training milti hai. IT industry ke liye best course hai.

BSc Biotech.desc: B.Sc. Biotechnology - Genetics, Molecular Biology, Genetic Engineering aur Tissue Culture ki practical training. Modern biotech labs with tissue culture facility available hai. Research aur pharma industry ke liye excellent opportunities.

BSc CS.desc: B.Sc. Computer Science - Physics, Maths aur CS combination me programming, algorithms aur software development sikhate hain. IT industry aur higher studies (MCA/MSc) ke liye strong foundation course.

BSc Maths/Bio.desc: B.Sc. with PCM (Physics, Chemistry, Maths) ya PCB (Physics, Chemistry, Biology) combination. Well-equipped labs for practicals. UPSC, banking exams aur research opportunities ke liye perfect preparation.
